hero.description: I create modern and elegant web experiences that merge impactful design with exceptional performance.

services.title: What do i help
services.description: My focus is on building intuitive and responsive interfaces that not only captivate users but also provide complete and effective solutions.
services.description-ux: Capable of creating attractive and functional interfaces, focusing on user experience and visual aesthetics.
services.description-back: Expert in programming logic for problem-solving and database management.
services.description-front: I turn designs into operational graphical interfaces, ensuring effective integration between visual appearance and functionality.

projects.title: Projects
projects.desc: Here you'll find a showcase of my personal projects, where I apply my creativity and technical skills to solve problems and create effective solutions. Explore these works to see how I bring my ideas to life.
projects.desc-CM: Web application to record and manage your daily expenses. It allows you to visualize your expenses by category and have a clearer control over your personal budget.
projects.desc-WY: Web platform that allows users to register, schedule, reschedule, and cancel medical appointments easily and efficiently through a calendar and a pleasant interface.
projects.desc-GYM: Design of a landing page for a gym using various Bootstrap components. This approach facilitates development by leveraging predefined elements and the flexibility of Bootstrap to create an attractive and functional page.
projects.desc-AP: Design of a landing page for a merchandise and construction distributor, using native CSS with a responsive design to adapt to mobile devices.
